maze.name: getCell
maze.description: Get cell type at position (returns "wall" for out of bounds)
maze.descriptionZh: 获取指定位置的格子类型（越界返回"wall"）

maze.name: autoCollect
maze.descriptionZh: 自动收集当前位置的星星

maze.name: forward
maze.description: Move player forward one cell in current direction
maze.code:
def forward():
    offset = DIRECTION_OFFSETS[world.direction]
    newX = world.x + offset[0]
    newY = world.y + offset[1]
    if getCell(newX, newY) == 'wall':
        return False
    world.x = newX
    world.y = newY
    autoCollect()
    return True

maze.name: backward
maze.code:
def backward():
    offset = DIRECTION_OFFSETS[world.direction]
    newX = world.x - offset[0]
    newY = world.y - offset[1]
    if getCell(newX, newY) == 'wall':
        return False
    world.x = newX
    world.y = newY
    autoCollect()
    return True

maze.name: move
turn
collect
maze.code:
def collect():
    cell = getCell(world.x, world.y)
    if cell == 'star':
        world.grid[world.y][world.x] = 'empty'
        world.collected = world.collected + 1
        return True
    return False

maze.name: frontBlocked
maze.description: Check if there is a wall in front
maze.code:
def frontBlocked():
    offset = DIRECTION_OFFSETS[world.direction]
    frontX = world.x + offset[0]
    frontY = world.y + offset[1]
    return getCell(frontX, frontY) == 'wall'

maze.name: frontClear
maze.description: Check if front is clear (not blocked)

maze.name: atGoal
maze.description: Check if player is at goal

maze.name: hasStar
maze.description: Check if there is a star at current position
maze.descriptionZh: 检查当前位置是否有星星

maze.name: remainingStars
maze.description: Get number of stars remaining in maze
maze.descriptionZh: 获取迷宫中剩余的星星数量

maze.name: collectedCount
maze.descriptionZh: 获取已收集的星星数量

turtle.name: forward
turtle.code:
def forward(distance):
    radians = world.angle * 3.14159265359 / 180
    dx = _cos(radians) * distance * world.stepSize
    dy = _sin(radians) * distance * world.stepSize * -1
    oldX = world.x
    oldY = world.y
    world.x = world.x + dx
    world.y = world.y + dy
    if world.penDown:
        _drawLine(oldX, oldY, world.x, world.y, world.penColor, world.penWidth)

terraria.name: getCell
terraria.descriptionZh: 获取指定位置的格子类型

terraria.name: isWalkable
terraria.code:
def isWalkable(cell):
    return cell in WALKABLE

terraria.name: getFrontPos
terraria.description: Get position in front of player

terraria.name: addToInventory
removeFromInventory
hasItem
getItemCount
terraria.description: Get count of item in inventory
terraria.descriptionZh: 获取背包中物品的数量

terraria.name: move
terraria.code:
def move(direction):
    dir = DIRECTION_MAP[direction]
    offset = DIRECTION_OFFSETS[dir]
    newX = world.x + offset[0]
    newY = world.y + offset[1]
    world.direction = dir
    targetCell = getCell(newX, newY)
    if not isWalkable(targetCell):
        return False
    world.x = newX
    world.y = newY
    return True

terraria.name: moveUp
terraria.code:
def moveUp():
    return move('up')

terraria.name: moveDown
terraria.code:
def moveDown():
    return move('down')

terraria.name: moveLeft
terraria.code:
def moveLeft():
    return move('left')

terraria.name: moveRight
terraria.code:
def moveRight():
    return move('right')

terraria.name: chop
terraria.code:
def chop():
    pos = getFrontPos()
    cell = getCell(pos[0], pos[1])
    if cell != 'tree':
        return False
    drops = CELL_DROPS[cell]
    addToInventory(drops[0], drops[1])
    world.grid[pos[1]][pos[0]] = 'empty'
    return True

terraria.name: mine
terraria.description: Mine block in front (needs pickaxe for stone/diamond)
terraria.descriptionZh: 挖掘前方的方块（需要镐子挖石头/钻石）

terraria.name: dig
terraria.code:
def dig():
    x = world.x
    y = world.y + 1
    cell = getCell(x, y)
    if cell != 'dirt':
        return False
    drops = CELL_DROPS[cell]
    addToInventory(drops[0], drops[1])
    world.grid[y][x] = 'empty'
    return True

terraria.name: place
craft
terraria.code:
def craft(itemName):
    if itemName not in RECIPES:
        return False
    recipe = RECIPES[itemName]
    ingredients = recipe[0]
    output = recipe[1]
    i = 0
    while i < len(ingredients):
        item = ingredients[i]
        count = ingredients[i + 1]
        if getItemCount(item) < count:
            return False
        i = i + 2
    i = 0
    while i < len(ingredients):
        item = ingredients[i]
        count = ingredients[i + 1]
        removeFromInventory(item, count)
        i = i + 2
    addToInventory(output[0], output[1])
    return True
